about_the_game:
Clan War Chess is visually striking with immersive gameplay with custom chess pieces. Each

map has its own design theme. There are animated and traditional chess pieces and can be

played against AI or battle it out with your friends!

With the over-board view you can move around and get up close to the battle action taking

Clan War Chess to the next level with:

 Play against a world leading AI, Stockfish 16

 Battle against your friends

 Free movement around the board

 Enjoy different environments

 Animated and Traditional Pieces

 Visual effects

 Easy for both new and experienced player to learn and enjoy the game

Combining the power of Unreal Engine 5 and Stockfish 16 AI makes it challenging in Player vs

AI!

Clan War Chess take the realism of chess and striking visuals to create a casual chess game

that you can take your time and enjoy the chess experience with your friends.

Please note:

PvP is Coming Soon and will be updated as soon as possible!

This is our first game so please be kind :)

name: Clan War Chess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10 or above
  • Processor: i3-8100+ or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060+ or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10 or above
  • Processor: i7-12700+ or AMD equivalent or above
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 2080+ or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Clan War Chess is visually striking with immersive gameplay with custom chess pieces. Each map has its own design theme. There are animated and traditional chess pieces and can be played against AI or battle it out with your friends!
